articles.title: I want to change perceptions: Zampa eyes a Baggy Green - cricket.com.au
articles.description: Australia's white-ball leg-spinner of choice sets his sights on a long-term project to become Nathan Lyon's partner on Australia's subcontinent Test tours
articles.content:
Adam Zampa, Australia's first-choice leg-spinner in limited overs cricket, has doubled down on his ambitions to earn a Baggy Green cap, declaring he wants to shed the public perception of him as a white-ball only bowler. 
Zampa, who is on a Cricket Australia… [+5471 chars]
